title: hammertime2
author: hammertime2
content: Hello again everyone!¬† ¬†So here we are, week 4, with a rollover, as nobody won the prize pool of $50 worth of BTC last weekSo now the rollover of $100 equivalent of BTC is up for grabs this week. A quick recap on how to play:- I will post 5 games below. All you have to do is decide the result of each game and post it here. So for each Game you need to choose either a Home Win (1), a Draw (X), or an Away Win (2). If you make it to the end of Game 5, you win. You will win either the full prizepool, or shared with however many winners there are. If nobody wins, the prize pool rolls over to the next week.For speed, an example selection for the 5 games could be: 1X221 good luck !¬† IMPORTANT- Entries close 1 hour before Game 1 starts.(All fixture times for GMT +1)Game 1 - Wednesday, 19th April @ 20:00, Bayern Munich v Manchester City (Champions League)Game 2 - Thursday 20th April @ 20:00, Sevilla v Manchester United (Europa League)Game 3 - Friday 21st April @ Arsenal v Southampton (Premier League)Game 4 - Saturday 22nd April @ 15:00, Brentford v Aston Villa (Premier League)Game 5 - Sunday 23rd April @ 14:00, Bournemouth v West Ham (Premier League)Game rules & eligibility- Must have 20 minimum Bitcointalk forum posts for your entry to be eligible- Pick either Home (1), Draw (X), or Away (2) for each game- Must be remaining after Game 5 to win.- If multiple winners, prize split between all winners- If no winners, prize pool rolls over to the next week- In the event that a game is cancelled/void, all players still in the tournament will progress to the next Game.-- All management decisions are final, collusion / cheating will not be tolerated

comments.author: hammertime2
comments.body: Afternoon everyone!Just to clarify a few things for the rules that I think are obvious but I notice I didn't include in initial post:- Predictions are for the 90 minutes only, doesn't include ET or Pens..- As per all previous comps, Winnings paid out on to BetKudos user balance (winners will need to register an account if you haven't already, and we will credit funds)Will update full list of user predictions later once competition entry is closed.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: It seems like i‚Äôm the only one who left here with the draw between Bayern Munich and Man City üòµ‚Äçüí´ Hard luck everyone and i hope my other predictions will go well for next days!

comments.author: hammertime2
comments.body: Was going to write up all the predictions in the table but as Aikidoka has correctly said, he/she is the only one that chose the draw, so everyone else is out!Good luck to youI imagine most other people will be rooting for the rollover though üòÇ haha

comments.author: hammertime2
comments.body: Rollover x2 it is then. $150 of BTC paid into BetKudos balance up for grabs next week.Will post new competition on Monday !

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: hammertime2 on April 22, 2023, 08:51:15 PMRollover x2 it is then. $150 of BTC paid into BetKudos balance up for grabs next week.Will post new competition on Monday !LOL just realized this is actually a tough game, this pot will be growing to a couple of thousand dollar's in a few months time if non of us are winning ..Might as well put a million dollars on deck Anyway is a Rollover!
